instruction: Construct an animated movie about a tiger.
output: The movie would follow the adventures of a tiger cub growing up in the wild. It would focus on his relationships with other animals, learning the ways of nature, and discovering his purpose as a tiger. The story would be told from the perspective of the tiger, with dialogue and music incorporated to emphasize various scenes. It would feature bright and vivid animation of the jungle throughout the movie. The movie would be suitable for all age groups, with underlying themes of acceptance and resolve.
